name: Grilled Zucchini, Scallions and New Potatoes
keywords: main course, side dish, new potatoes, scallion, zucchini, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the grill. Slice the unpeeled potatoes into one-eighth-inch-thick rounds. Slice the zucchini into half-inch rounds. Toss the potatoes, zucchini and whole scallions with the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
Grill potatoes, zucchini and scallions, turning once, until they are tender and golden brown, about eight minutes.
Slice the scallions into two-inch pieces. Combined the grilled vegetables in a bowl and correct the seasoning. Add the thyme, toss and serve warm or at room temperature.
